rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî football fans in stadium crowd
rounds.pro_tip: CROWD ENERGY: Real crowd photos have chaotic variety ‚Äî different expressions, mid-motion blur, varied clothing. AI crowds often look like cloned figures with eerily similar poses.
LIGHTING CONSISTENCY: Stadium lights create specific shadow patterns. In real photos, every shadow points back to identifiable light sources. AI often has shadows that contradict each other.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî BBQ grill with smoke at outdoor party
rounds.pro_tip: SMOKE BEHAVIOR: Real smoke is wispy, semi-transparent, and follows air currents unpredictably. AI smoke looks like soft cotton or a uniform gray cloud without natural turbulence.
HAND CHECK: Zoom into any hands in the image. AI infamously struggles with finger count, knuckle placement, and natural hand poses. Real hands have visible veins, wrinkles, and varied skin tones.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî hot dogs and game day food spread
rounds.pro_tip: FOOD IMPERFECTION: Real game day food is messy ‚Äî ketchup smears, uneven toppings, grease stains on paper plates. AI food styling is weirdly immaculate, like a catalogue shoot.

rounds.attribution: AI-generated ‚Äî photorealistic portrait in outdoor setting
rounds.pro_tip: SKIN PORES: Real skin at close range shows pores, fine hair, and natural color variation (redness around nose, darker under eyes). AI skin often looks like airbrushed plastic.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî parking lot tailgate setup with canopy
rounds.pro_tip: BACKGROUND CLUTTER: Real tailgate scenes have messy, organic backgrounds ‚Äî random cars, scattered coolers, tangled extension cords. AI over-tidies backgrounds or fills them with nonsensical objects.
FLAG AND BANNER TEXT: Any text on banners, flags, or jerseys is a major tell. AI almost never renders readable text correctly ‚Äî look for garbled letters or nonsense words.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî close-up of grilled food with char marks
rounds.pro_tip: GRILL MARKS: Real char has irregular, organic patterns that follow the food's surface contours. AI grill marks tend to be perfectly parallel or geometrically uniform.

rounds.attribution: Real photograph ‚Äî evening outdoor scene with string lights
rounds.pro_tip: STRING LIGHTS: Real bulbs have natural variation ‚Äî some brighter, some dimmer, with realistic lens flare. AI string lights are often perfectly uniform with identical halos around each bulb.
